description: Vicki is born without arms and this documentary looks at her approach to life and her ways of coping with work, her future marriage, her desire for children and the way people treat her. One of a series of films originally created for a day-time television discussion panel which was designed to alert the public to the range of social services available from Government and other agencies. Suitable for secondary school level.
